title: Smart Data Model - User Activity schema
description: Information on the current activity performed by an anonymized user in a given point in time

dateActivityStarted.description: Property. It must be equal to UserActivity.

refObject.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Reference to the object of the action (e.g. Car1). It may be another NGSI Entity or any `Object` identified by an URI.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

activityType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The action performed (e.g. Drive). Normative References: [https://schema.org/Action](https://schema.org/Action), [https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#activity-types](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#activity-types), [https://health-lifesci.schema.org/PhysicalActivityCategory](https://health-lifesci.schema.org/PhysicalActivityCategory)

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refTarget.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Reference to the target of the action (e.g. Office1).

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refAgent.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Reference to the agent (i.e. a person) performing the activity. It may be another NGSI Entity or any `Agent` identified by an URI.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be Activity
